name: Heal Palestine
mission: Sheltering Program provides immediate, practical protection for families who have nowhere else to go.
theoryOfChange: Healing happens through four pillars (Health, Aid, Education, Leadership) to provide both urgent lifesaving care and sustainable long-term career and health outcomes.
zakatClaimEvidence:
Does HEAL Palestine Follow a 100% Zakat Policy? Yes! Every dollar of your Zakat is used for direct aid—providing healthcare, food, and emergency relief to those who need it most.
At HEAL Palestine, we ensure that 100% of Zakat contributions are distributed to eligible recipients with full transparency and accountability.
HEAL Palestine is a Zakat-certified nonprofit dedicated to providing essential medical care, education, and humanitarian aid to families in need. (Source: https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHasZlrxND4WzTELbAAyWlprSyvYbigc4KEM0aJwQiH7Yv5TKaihDqH3TDrU22IrTUIzQUr4Bu0qMbQLSdhW0Kf0e10u90RWRVnIaxK9TFZyTLFWsX-RVlrut0gdk6lfw==)

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: ibn_sabil (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Strong humanitarian service (+4)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.improvement_suggestion: Expand services to underserved populations or regions with limited nonprofit coverage
components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 38/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.improvement_suggestion: Build working capital reserves to 1-3 months of operating expenses
components.name: Financial Health

components.improvement_suggestion: Seek external evaluation or track outcomes for 3+ years
components.name: Evidence & Outcomes

components.improvement_suggestion: Document a clear theory of change with causal pathway
components.name: Theory of Change

all_citations.claim: HEAL Palestine Inc. operates programs including aid for bakeries, food distribution, and sheltering support.
The organization reported total revenue of $20,223,260 with a program expense ratio of 88.2% and fundraising efficiency of $0.01 per $1 raised.
The organization is Zakat-eligible and provides immediate protection for families through its sheltering program.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a 67/100 score due to its high financial efficiency and urgent humanitarian mission, though its impact score is moderated by the high cost per beneficiary of approximately $719.93.
areas_for_improvement: Limited historical data available due to the organization's recent financial filings
Opportunity to increase direct impact score through expanded third-party verification

dimension_explanations.alignment: With an alignment score of 38/50, the charity shows high donor fit for those prioritizing humanitarian relief in high-urgency zones [1]. The organization is Zakat-eligible and offers various giving methods to accommodate religious and philanthropic requirements [3].
dimension_explanations.impact: HEAL Palestine demonstrates a high program expense ratio of 88.2%, indicating that most of its $20,223,260 in total revenue is directed toward direct services like food and shelter [1][2]. While the organization holds 17.8 months of working capital for stability, the impact score of 29/50 reflects a relatively high cost per beneficiary of $719.9322 [2].

baseline_narrative.headline: HEAL Palestine Inc. provides urgent humanitarian relief and sheltering for families in crisis with exceptional financial efficiency.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 88.2% ensures the vast majority of funds reach those in need
Exceptional fundraising efficiency of $0.01 per $1 raised
Strong liquidity with 17.8 months of working capital
Zakat-eligible status for Muslim donors seeking humanitarian alignment
baseline_narrative.summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. is a humanitarian organization dedicated to providing immediate protection and essential aid to families with nowhere else to go through its specialized Sheltering Program [1][3]. The organization manages a diverse range of relief efforts, including bakery operations, food parcel distribution, and comprehensive sheltering support [1][2].

rich_narrative.headline: HEAL Palestine Inc. provides urgent humanitarian relief and sheltering for families in crisis with exceptional financial efficiency.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to provide immediate, high-efficiency humanitarian relief to Palestinian families in Gaza and the West Bank through a zakat-eligible framework.
donor_motivations: Want to ensure over 88% of their donation goes directly to aid
Prioritize urgent humanitarian needs like food, shelter, and healthcare
Seek to fulfill zakat obligations through a verified Palestinian relief organization
Value high transparency and platinum-level reporting
giving_considerations: The organization is very young (founded 2024) and still building its long-term track record
Focus is on immediate crisis response rather than long-term systemic change
High liquidity suggests the organization is well-prepared for short-term shocks
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking organizations with decades of historical data or those looking for advocacy-focused political work.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade C reflects that while the organization tracks 8 outcome metrics, it lacks 3+ years of data and external evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: HEAL Palestine uses a strategic approach to address immediate needs (shelter, food) and long-term empowerment for children.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that the $719 spent per beneficiary is effectively translating into improved safety and health outcomes.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The ongoing humanitarian crisis in Gaza creates an almost unlimited need for sheltering and aid services.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Maintains a <cite id="6">fundraising efficiency of $0.01</cite>, which is significantly better than many larger peers.

similar_organizations.differentiator: Larger global footprint and longer history
similar_organizations.name: Save the Children Federation

similar_organizations.differentiator: Specialized medical focus and larger scale
similar_organizations.name: Doctors Without Borders

strengths.detail: The organization directs <cite id="4">88.2% of its total expenses</cite> toward programs, supported by a <cite id="6">fundraising efficiency of $0.01 per $1 raised</cite>.
HEAL Palestine maintains <cite id="7">17.8 months of working capital</cite>, providing significant stability for its humanitarian operations in volatile regions.
The charity has earned the <cite id="8">Candid Platinum Seal of Transparency</cite> and tracks <cite id="9">eight distinct outcome metrics</cite> to monitor impact.

strengths_deep_dive: HEAL Palestine's operational model is built for rapid response in high-conflict zones. By maintaining <cite id="7">17.8 months of working capital in reserve</cite>, the organization can sustain its <cite id="10">bakery operations and food parcel distribution</cite> even during funding fluctuations. Their commitment to transparency is evidenced by their <cite id="11">documented theory of change</cite> and the tracking of <cite id="9">8 outcome metrics</cite>, which is notable for an organization founded so recently. Furthermore, their grantmaking activity is significant, with <cite id="12">$1,339,352 in foreign grants</cite> distributed to support local implementation and relief efforts.
rich_narrative.summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. is a humanitarian organization founded in <cite id="1">2024</cite> to provide immediate protection and essential aid to families in crisis. The organization operates primarily in <cite id="2">Gaza, the West Bank, and Cairo</cite>, focusing on urgent relief through its specialized Sheltering Program, which offers practical protection for families with nowhere else to go. Despite its recent founding, the charity has rapidly scaled its operations, reporting <cite id="3">total revenue of $20,223,260</cite>. Its financial model is characterized by extreme leaness, maintaining a <cite id="4">program expense ratio of 88.2%</cite>, ensuring that the vast majority of donor funds are directed toward direct service delivery. The organization's impact is multifaceted, encompassing <cite id="5">health, aid, education, and leadership programs</cite>, alongside a dedicated orphan support initiative. HEAL Palestine demonstrates high financial efficiency, spending only <cite id="6">$0.01 to raise every $1</cite> in donations, which allows for a high degree of resource allocation toward its core mission of empowering Palestinian children and their families.
